verses.verse: A Psalm. <S%H4210><s%> O sing <S%H7891><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> song; <S%H7892><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> he hath done <S%H6213><s%> marvelous things: <S%H6381><s%> his right hand, <S%H3225><s%> and his holy <S%H6944><s%> arm, <S%H2220><s%> hath gotten him the victory. <S%H3467><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath made known <S%H3045><s%> his salvation: <S%H3444><s%> his righteousness <S%H6666><s%> hath he openly showed <S%H1540><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the heathen. <S%H1471><s%>

He hath remembered <S%H2142><s%> his mercy <S%H2617><s%> and his truth <S%H530><s%> toward the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the salvation <S%H3444><s%> of our God. <S%H430><s%>
Make a joyful noise <S%H7321><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the earth: <S%H776><s%> make a loud noise, <S%H6476><s%> and rejoice, <S%H7442><s%> and sing praise. <S%H2167><s%>
Sing <S%H2167><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> with the harp; <S%H3658><s%> with the harp, <S%H3658><s%> and the voice <S%H6963><s%> of a psalm. <S%H2172><s%>
With trumpets <S%H2689><s%> and sound <S%H6963><s%> of cornet <S%H7782><s%> make a joyful noise <S%H7321><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> the King. <S%H4428><s%>
Let the sea <S%H3220><s%> roar, <S%H7481><s%> and the fullness <S%H4393><s%> thereof; the world, <S%H8398><s%> and they that dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein.
Let the floods <S%H5104><s%> clap <S%H4222><s%> their hands: <S%H3709><s%> let the hills <S%H2022><s%> be joyful <S%H7442><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>

Before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> he cometh <S%H935><s%> to judge <S%H8199><s%> the earth: <S%H776><s%> with righteousness <S%H6664><s%> shall he judge <S%H8199><s%> the world, <S%H8398><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> with equity. <S%H4339><s%>
